allow: Bash(for region in us-east-1 us-east-2 us-west-1 us-west-2 ap-northeast-2)
Bash(do echo '===== Region: $region =====' aws ec2 describe-instances --region $region --query 'Reservations[].Instances[].[InstanceId, State.Name]' --output text)
Bash(for zone_id in Z06041243O8YW3T09470O Z04007144HIQVPHHRRRE Z06584881XYBOOBRS95WM Z03975731WP68IRQYU623)
